thread.title: Milacron Holdings Corp. To Announce Fourth Quarter 2017 Results

author: cnbc.com
title: Milacron Holdings Corp. To Announce Fourth Quarter 2017 Results
text:
CINCINNATI--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Milacron Holdings Corp. (NYSE: MCRN), a leading industrial technology company serving the plastics processing industry, announced today that the companyâ€™s fourth quarter 2017 financial results will be released on Tuesday, February 20, 2018 before the market open.
Milacron will hold a conference call at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time the same day. The live webcast of the call can be accessed at the Milacron Investor Relations website at http://investors.milacron.com , along with the company's earnings press release and related presentation materials.
The U.S. dial-in for the call is 1-877-407-8037 (1-201-689-8037 for non-U.S. callers). A replay of the conference call will be available until March 6, 2018 at 11:59 p.m. Eastern Time, while an archived version of the webcast will be available on the Milacron Investor Relations website for 90 days. The U.S. dial-in for the conference call replay is 1-877-660-6853 (1-201-612-7415). The replay access code is 13676323.
About Milacron
Milacron is a global leader in the manufacture, distribution, and service of highly engineered and customized systems within the plastic technology and processing industry. Milacron is the only global company with a full-line product portfolio that includes hot runner systems, injection molding, blow molding and extrusion equipment, mold components, industrial supplies plus a wide market range of advanced fluid technologies. Visit Milacron at www.milacron.com .
MCRN-IR
